summary: This makes the vampire lord wings larger. It\'s fully compatible with Grimoa\'s vampire lord and that\'s what i recommend using as this mod is made just for that.
descriptionHtml:
This makes the vampire lord wings larger. It\'s fully compatible with Grimoa\'s vampire lord and that\'s what i recommend using as this mod is made just for that. There is a mod on the steam workshop that i believe it does the same. But i didn\'t like how it was encrypted so i couldn\'t expirement with how my personal preference was for the size. So i figured it out myself how to do this. It\'s just a simple skeleton edit in Nifskope but perhaps you guys will like it. If you don\'t i can make the wings smaller/larger. You\'ll just have to ask me or you can try to do this yourself.

This mod works with custom retextures as confirmed by other\'s.

I recommend this mod: Grimoa\'s vampire lord: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29085//?

I also recommend this mod if you want your vampire lord to be able to fly.
Royal Bloodline: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22565//?
author: pascaliedema
